info.title: HealthcareApisClient
info.description: Use this API to manage Microsoft HealthcareApis services in your Azure subscription.

ServicesProperties.description: The properties of a service instance.

accessPolicies.description: The access policies of the service instance.

cosmosDbConfiguration.description: The settings for the Cosmos DB database backing the service.

authenticationConfiguration.description: The authentication configuration for the service instance.

corsConfiguration.description: The settings for the CORS configuration of the service instance.

exportConfiguration.description: The settings for the export operation of the service instance.

privateEndpointConnections.description: The list of private endpoint connections that are set up for this resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks while private endpoint is enabled.

acrConfiguration.description: The azure container registry settings used for convert data operation of the service instance.

ServiceAccessPoliciesInfo.description: The access policies of the service instance.

objectId.description: An Azure AD object ID (User or Apps) that is allowed access to the FHIR service.

ServiceCosmosDbConfigurationInfo.description: The settings for the Cosmos DB database backing the service.

offerThroughput.description: The provisioned throughput for the backing database.

keyVaultKeyUri.description: The URI of the customer-managed key for the backing database.

authority.description: The authority url for the service

audience.description: The audience url for the service

smartProxyEnabled.description: If the SMART on FHIR proxy is enabled

ServiceCorsConfigurationInfo.description: The settings for the CORS configuration of the service instance.

origins.description: The origins to be allowed via CORS.

headers.description: The headers to be allowed via CORS.

methods.description: The methods to be allowed via CORS.

maxAge.description: The max age to be allowed via CORS.

allowCredentials.description: If credentials are allowed via CORS.

loginServers.description: The list of the ACR login servers.

ociArtifacts.description: The list of Open Container Initiative (OCI) artifacts.

identity.description: Setting indicating whether the service has a managed identity associated with it.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the resource identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the resource.

type.description: Type of identity being specified, currently SystemAssigned and None are allowed.

nextLink.description: The link used to get the next page of service description objects.

value.description: A list of service description objects.

ServicesPropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The properties for updating a service instance.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Control permission for data plane traffic coming from public networks while private endpoint is enabled.

name.description: The name of the service instance to check.

type.description: The fully qualified resource type which includes provider namespace.

target.description: The target of the particular error.

nextLink.description:
URL client should use to fetch the next page (per server side paging).
It's null for now, added for future use.

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane. This is "true" for data-plane operations and "false" for ARM/control-plane operations.

actionType.description: Enum. Indicates the action type. "Internal" refers to actions that are for internal only APIs.

OperationDisplay.description: The object that represents the operation.

OperationResultsDescription.description: The properties indicating the operation result of an operation on a service.

id.description: The ID of the operation returned.

name.description: The name of the operation result.

status.description: The status of the operation being performed.

startTime.description: The time that the operation was started.

endTime.description: The time that the operation finished.

properties.description: Additional properties of the operation result.

logSpecifications.description: Specifications of the Log for Azure Monitoring

metricSpecifications.description: Specifications of the Metrics for Azure Monitoring

LogSpecification.description: Specifications of the Log for Azure Monitoring

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the log

MetricSpecification.description: Specifications of the Metrics for Azure Monitoring

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the metric

displayDescription.description: Localized friendly description of the metric

unit.description: Unit that makes sense for the metric

category.description: Name of the metric category that the metric belongs to. A metric can only belong to a single category.

aggregationType.description: Only provide one value for this field. Valid values: Average, Minimum, Maximum, Total, Count.

fillGapWithZero.description: Optional. If set to true, then zero will be returned for time duration where no metric is emitted/published.

sourceMdmNamespace.description: Name of the MDM namespace. Optional.

MetricDimension.description: Specifications of the Dimension of metrics

displayName.description: Localized friendly display name of the dimension

toBeExportedForShoebox.description: Whether this dimension should be included for the Shoebox export scenario

ResourceTags.description: List of key value pairs that describe the resource. This will overwrite the existing tags.

ResourceCore.description: The common properties for any resource, tracked or proxy.

etag.description: An etag associated with the resource, used for optimistic concurrency when editing it.

LocationBasedResource.description: The common properties for any location based resource, tracked or proxy.

TaggedResource.description: The common properties of tracked resources in the service.

ServiceManagedIdentity.description: Managed service identity (system assigned and/or user assigned identities)

identity.description: Setting indicating whether the service has a managed identity associated with it.

type.description: Type of identity being specified, currently SystemAssigned and None are allowed.

principalId.description: The service principal ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

tenantId.description: The tenant ID of the system assigned identity. This property will only be provided for a system assigned identity.

principalId.description: The principal ID of the assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client ID of the assigned identity.

UserAssignedIdentities.title: User-Assigned Identities
UserAssignedIdentities.description: The set of user assigned identities associated with the resource. The userAssignedIdentities dictionary keys will be ARM resource ids in the form: '/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/{identityName}. The dictionary values can be empty objects ({}) in requests.

resourceName.name: resourceName
resourceName.description: The name of the service instance.

get.description: Get the metadata of a service instance.

200.description: The body contains all of the properties of the service instance.

default.description: Default error response

put.description: Create or update the metadata of a service instance.

200.description: Updated - Put request accepted and an existing resource is being updated; the operation will complete asynchronously.

201.description: Created - Put request accepted and a new resource was created; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

patch.description: Update the metadata of a service instance.

requestBody.description: The service instance metadata and security metadata.

200.description: The tags for the resource were updated successfully.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

202.description: Accepted - Delete request accepted; the operation will complete asynchronously.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Get all the service instances in a subscription.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the service instances in the subscription.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Get all the service instances in a resource group.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the service instances in the resource group.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

post.description: Check if a service instance name is available.

requestBody.description: Set the name parameter in the CheckNameAvailabilityParameters structure to the name of the service instance to check.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized response that specifies whether the service name is available. If the name is not available, the body contains the reason.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Lists all private endpoint connections for a service.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Gets the specified private endpoint connection associated with the service.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

put.description: Update the state of the specified private endpoint connection associated with the service.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

202.description: The request was successful; the operation will complete asynchronously.

204.description: No Content - The private endpoint connection does not exist.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Gets the private link resources that need to be created for a service.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Gets a private link resource that need to be created for a service.

parameters.name: groupName
parameters.description: The name of the private link resource group.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: DefaultErrorResponse

get.description: Lists all the available workspaces under the specified subscription.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the workspaces in the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Lists all the available workspaces under the specified resource group.

200.description: This is a synchronous operation. The body contains a JSON-serialized array of the metadata from all the workspaces in the resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Gets the properties of the specified workspace.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed
